subject: Har dam duayen dena har lamha aahen bharana
text:
har dam duayen dena har lamha aahen bharana
in ka bhi kam karana apana bhi kam karana
yan kis ko hai mayyasar ye kam kar guzarana
ek bankpan pe jina ek bankpan pe marana
jo zist ko na samajhe jo maut ko na jane
jina unhin ka jina marana unhin ka marana
hariyali zindagi pe sadaqe hazar jane
mujhko nahi gavara sahil ke maut marana
ranginiyan nahi to ranaiyan bhi kaisi
shabanam si nazanin ko aata nahi sanvarna
teri inayaton se mujhko bhi aa chala hai
teri himayaton mein har-har qadam guzarana
kuch aa chali hai aahat is payanaz ke si
tujh par khuda ke rahamat ae dil zara thaharana
khun-e-jigar ka hasil ik sher tak ke surat
apana hi aks jis mein apana hi rang bharana
